text: Mesiya (Yesu) mwene Mariyamu (Mariya), nta kindi yari cyo uretse ko yari Intumwa (ya Allah), kandi na mbere ye habayeho izindi ntumwa zahise. Ndetse na Nyina (Mariyamu) yari umwizera bihebuje (kuko yizeraga amagambo ya Allah). Bombi bararyaga (ibyo kurya nk’abandi bantu basanzwe, mu gihe Allah atajya arya). Reba uko tubasobanurira ibimenyetso, hanyuma unarebe uko (abantu) birengagiza (ukuri)
